name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Image Saving via CSS Selector

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is designed to facilitate the quick and efficient saving of images from web pages using CSS selectors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ideal for professionals and hobbyists alike who handle multiple images for projects or collections, this tool simplifies the acquisition of digital assets, making it a seamless addition to the Chrome browser.

Streamline your image-saving process with our Chrome Extension.

With our Chrome Extension, you can effortlessly find, specify, and download images directly from web pages. This tool enriches your browsing experience by offering:

 - CSS Selector Integration: Use powerful CSS selectors to target images by class, ID, or custom attributes.
 - Multiple Image Management: Easily handle and download multiple images simultaneously, perfect for projects or personal collections.
 - Bulk Download in ZIP: Download all selected images in a convenient ZIP archive, simplifying file management.
 - Customizable Order: Choose how to order your images, either by their position on the page from top to bottom or without specific ordering, and images are saved with their default names as they appear on the page.
 - User-friendly Interface: Navigate smoothly with a simple and intuitive interface.
 - Quick Installation: Set up the extension in just a few clicks and integrate it seamlessly into your Chrome browser.
 - Versatile Usage: Ideal for professionals and hobbyists needing to manage digital assets efficiently.

This is the official version of our Chrome Extension. Avoid imitations you may find on the webstore; counterfeit versions could pose security risks.

Please Note:
The images retrieved by our Chrome Extension may be protected by copyright. Always confirm the image's license and usage terms before reusing it. Do not use any images without proper verification of their copyright status.

Enjoy efficient and smart image downloading with ease!
